name: Chef John's Ultimate Steak Sandwich
author: Chef John
summary: In this non-traditional steak sandwich, the steak is cut into thick strips, so we're able to get a nice sear on the outside without having to worry about the inside overcooking.
ingredients: 8 ounces brown clamshell mushrooms, grilled, separated
½ cup mayonnaise, or as needed
1 cup arugula leaves, or as needed
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate
Season generously with salt and pepper
Grill mushrooms for 5-6 minutes over medium-high heat until they begin to wilt
Remove the stem end to separate the mushrooms
Stir mushrooms in a bowl with salt and pepper, sherry vinegar, and extra virgin olive oil
Grill steaks for 3-4 minutes per side over medium-high heat, until medium rare or to desired doneness
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 140 degrees F (60 degrees C)
Whisk together barbeque sauce, cider vinegar and vegetable oil
Serve grilled steaks on hot dog buns with mayonnaise, arugula, cherry tomatoes, grilled mushrooms, and barbeque sauce mixture
